cab.content: SECRET(P. 1351) From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department,Uth March 1921.Clear the Hue.1135. Your telegram dated the 7th March. Afghanistan. Your instructions to Dobbs are approved subject to remark as regards (3) that Dobbs should not of course give the impression that because subsidy was coupled with consulates in your letter of the 7th November objection to subsidy rests only on this one ground. As regards (2) 1 gather that you agree that disclosure of Bolshevik terms must be insisted on at some stage as a necessary preliminary to liud conclusion ol' an agreement by us. Your instructions to Dobbs on this point seem adequate for the present.
